titleStmt.title: A godly and learned exposition vppon the Prouerbes of Solomon: written in French by Maister Michael Cope, minister of the woorde of God, at Geneua: and translated into English, by M.O.
Sur les Proverbes de Salomon. English
titleStmt.author: Cope, Michael, fl. 1557-1564.
Outred, Marcelline.
Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Sur les Proverbes de Salomon.
Colophon reads: Imprinted at London by Thomas Dawson, dwelling at the three Cranes in the Vintreee, for George Byshop, 1580.
Running title reads: Michael Cope vpon the Prouerbes.
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
